views

Class EditorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • views.EditorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class EditorView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    EditorView class that extends Swing JFrame. It is the view for the game editor. It has a jmenubar, jmenus, jmenuitems and image and jcombobox etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
